modName: Slooty Christmas Mashup 7B HDT-  SSE Port
summary:
This is a port of the original Oldrim mod by asenasen. This is my first attempt at creating/porting a mod, and just in time for Christmas :)
Original Mod can be found here: https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/2499-slutty-christmas-mashup-for-7b/
If there are any issues, other than those specified, please let me know
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]THIS MOD IS A PORT FROM OLDRIM!!![/size][/b]   I did not create this mod, all credit goes to asenasen (https://www.loverslab.com/profile/62694-asenasen/).

[u][b][size=4]Requirements[/size]:[/b][/u]  [size=3]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Special Edition (https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1988)
                            I would also recommend  HDT Heels as well to prevent the boots from clipping into the ground.  Couldn't find a link to SE version on Nexus though...
[/size]
[size=4]

[b][u]Known issues:[/u][/b][/size]   [size=3]There is a bit of clipping with the hat.  this could just be because of the hair that was used (I used Trixie the Christmas elf as a model [https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14030]).  Also, images for the items don't appear in your inventory.   Not entirely sure why yet.

[/size]
[b][size=5]NOTE:[/size][/b]  [size=3]There is currently no way to get these items without console commands.  I plan to fix this as soon as I can, but due to my limited skill and experience, it could be a while before this happens.  Any Help with this would be greatly appreciated.   In the mean time, simply bring up the console command (it's the tilde [~] button, and type "help slutty"  (minus the quotes).



[u][b]Installation:  [/b][/u]
1.  Use NMM
          OR
1. Download Manually
2. Extract the Files
3. Place Extracted Files into your Skyrim SE data file.


[u][b][size=4]Uninstall:[/size][/b][/u]
1. Delete from NMM
﻿ OR
1. Delete Files from your Skyrim SE data folder
[b]




Below [size=5][size=3]are the words of asenasen.  Their description should say all you need to know about the original mod.  My description was for the ported version[/size].
EVERYTHING BELOW THIS SENTENCE WAS COPIED AND PASTED OFF THE ORIGINAL MOD SITE!!![/size][/b]


About This File
[b]About the mod:[/b]
This is a (lewd) mashup of parts from various Christmas related outfits including:
+ The coat from Vindictus Santa Robe by [b]jianeddie[/b].
+ The collar & neck bell from f51 armor by fox6000.
+ gloves and boots from Vindictus Santa Robe by [b]jianeddie[/b].
+ Pasties from Santa Robe by [b]SpeedBuster[/b].
+ accessory bells from Kasumi Christmas Outfit by [b]fizz[/b].
Not that the coat clips horribly with certain poses, and I'm currently looking for a way to fix it.
The mashup was inspired by this post on SpeedBuster's blog: [url=http://akaspb.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-549.html]http://akaspb.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-549.html[/url]
 
[b]Updates:[/b]
v1.5: Coat is now fixed, and was broken off from the main outfit as an individual item. (using slot 44)
 
[b]Check list:[/b]
Clipping-free guarantee: [b]Semi-Check[/b]
Weight slider support: [b]Check[/b]
Gives you dreams of a White Christmas: [b]Definitely Check [/b][img width=20,height=20]https://www.loverslab.com/resources/emoticons/default_wink.png[/img]
[b]Requirement(s):[/b]
XMPSE2 Skeleton
HDT High Heels (Set the custom height to around 10 - 15. Without this, the boots will sink to the ground)
 
[b]Installation:[/b]
Just use any mod manager to install the armor.
Or manually, you can just drop everything into [skyrim Directory]\Data
 
[b]Obtaining Methods:[/b]
Option 1: Use this wonderful mod AddItemMenu: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]http://www.nexusmods…im/mods/64905/?[/url]
Option 2: Press “~” ingame to bring up console, type “help Slutty", and add the items
into your game.
Option 3: TesVedit, CreationKit, etc (not recommended)
 
[b]Uninstallation:[/b]
Deactivate in mod manager
Or delete the following:
Data\meshes\Christmas Mashup
Data\textures\armor\SpeedBuster
Data\textures\clothes\Vindictus
Data\textures\fizz\doa5u\kasumi
Data\textures\fox011\f051
Slutty Christmas Mashup.esp
 
[b]To-do list:[/b]
- Fix the coat-
 
[b]Credits:[/b]
[b]Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/b] for the 7B Bombshell body.
[b]jianeddie [/b]for the Vindictus Santa Robe.
[b]fox6000[/b] for the f51 armor.
[b]SpeedBuster[/b] for the Santa Robe armor.
[b]fizz[/b] for the Kasumi Christmas armor.
 
[b]Disclaimer:[/b]
I'm not going to make a CBBE/Bodyslide conversion for this, but feel free to do so, as long as you
give proper credit to the above authors.

[/size]
author: vonhugenstein
